TEXT_DICT.This: Contains pairs of Strings, used to get values based on keys.

TEXT: When playing as The Defier, #yConfusion muddles cards between #b0–2 Energy instead of #b0–3 Energy.
The Defier starts with only 1 Energy. Many cards have alternate costs, such as gaining #yVulnerable or taking damage via cards with the #yReckless tag
Playing a card grants you 1 #yLion's #yHeart. Right-clicking the character spends 15 #yLion's #yHeart to reduce the cost of a card by 1 this combat.
